Package com.kloudtek.systyrant.annotation

  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Alternative  
    Attr  
    Cleanup  
    CreateElement  
    Default  
    Dependency  
    Execute  
    Function  
    HandleNotification  
    Inject
    This annotation is used to inject objects into a field of a java class annotated with STResource.
    New
    This annotation can be used to create a new resource using the Systyrant DSL.
    NewChild
    This annotation can be used to create a new child resource using the Systyrant DSL.
    OnlyIf  
    OnlyIfArch  
    OnlyIfHostMetaData  
    OnlyIfOperatingSystem  
    Param  
    PostExecute  
    PreExecute  
    Prepare  
    Provider  
    Requires  
    Resources
    This annotation is used to inject other resources (retrieving using the query specified in Resources.value()) from the context into a Resource's field.
    Service
    This annotation can be used to indicate classes to be registered as services ServiceManager.registerService(String, Object), or to inject a service into a java resource implementation (a class annotated with STResource)
    STResource  
    Sync  
    Unique  
    Verify
